name: Harlequin
description: Harlequin is a sativa marijuana strain renowned for its reliable expression of CBD. This strain provides clear-headed effects and the ability to relax without sedation or intoxication. Harlequin is a descendant of Colombian Gold, a Nepali indica, and Thai and Swiss landrace strains. Harlequin's high levels of CBD make this strain one of the most effective strains for treating pain and anxiety, as CBD can counteract THCâ€™s paranoia while amplifying its painkilling properties. This strain features flavors that range from earthy musk to sweet mango.
